solution_line_template: Wraps add {raw_squat_weight}*{wraps_percentage_increase}=<<{raw_squat_weight}*{wraps_percentage_increase}={wraps_added_weight}>>{wraps_added_weight} pounds to his lift
So they add {wraps_added_weight}-{sleeves_added_weight}=<<{wraps_added_weight}-{sleeves_added_weight}={difference_wraps_sleeves}>>{difference_wraps_sleeves} pounds more than sleeves
